languages.text: "Мальпийцы имеют в сердцах глубокое самоотречение, их обеты нестяжательства схожи с нашими. Но им не хватает смирения и почтения к мертвым. Кровавая паутина могла бы принять их пастырей. Научить. Усмирить смуту".

"The Malpians have renounced the concept of possession. Their vows are true and similar to ours, but they lack humility and reverence for the dead. The Bloodspun Web could embrace their leaders. We could teach them. We could soothe the turmoil."
languages.original_text: "Мальпийцы имеют в сердцах глубокое самоотречение, их обеты нестяжательства схожи с нашими. Но им не хватает смирения и почтения к мертвым. Кровавая паутина могла бы принять их пастырей. Научить. Усмирить смуту".

traits.locale_text: "The Malpians have sincere renunciation in their hearts. Their vows of nescience are similar to ours, but they lack humility and reverence for the dead. Bloodspun Web could embrace their shepherds, teach them, soothe the turmoil."

languages.text: "Die Malpianer haben sich vom Konzept des Besitzes losgesagt. Ihre Eide sind wahrhaftig und ähneln den unseren, aber es fehlt ihnen an Demut und Ehrfurcht vor den Toten. Das Blutgesponnene Netz könnte ihre Anführer aufnehmen. Wir könnten sie unterrichten. Wir könnten das Chaos lindern."
languages.original_text: "The Malpians have renounced the concept of possession. Their vows are true and similar to ours, but they lack humility and reverence for the dead. The Bloodspun Web could embrace their leaders. We could teach them. We could soothe the turmoil."

traits.locale_text: "Die Malpianer haben sich vom Konzept des Besitzes losgesagt. Ihre Eide sind wahrhaftig und ähneln den unseren, aber es fehlt ihnen an Demut und Ehrfurcht vor den Toten. Das Blutgesponnene Netz könnte ihre Anführer aufnehmen. Wir könnten sie unterrichten. Wir könnten das Chaos lindern."

languages.text: « Les Malpiens ont renoncé au concept de propriété privée. Leurs vœux sont sincères et similaires aux nôtres, mais ils manquent cruellement d'humilité et de respect envers les morts. La Toile de Sang pourrait prendre leurs chefs sous son aile, les instruire et apaiser leurs tourments. »
languages.original_text: "The Malpians have renounced the concept of possession. Their vows are true and similar to ours, but they lack humility and reverence for the dead. The Bloodspun Web could embrace their leaders. We could teach them. We could soothe the turmoil."

traits.locale_text: « Les Malpiens ont renoncé au concept de propriété privée. Leurs vœux sont sincères et similaires aux nôtres, mais ils manquent cruellement d'humilité et de respect envers les morts. La Toile de Sang pourrait prendre leurs chefs sous son aile, les instruire et apaiser leurs tourments. »

languages.text: «Los malpianos han renunciado al concepto de las posesiones. Sus juramentos son verdaderos y similares a los nuestros, pero carentes de humildad y respeto hacia los muertos. La Red Sanguinolenta aceptaría a sus líderes. Podríamos enseñarles y apaciguar su tormento».
languages.original_text: "The Malpians have renounced the concept of possession. Their vows are true and similar to ours, but they lack humility and reverence for the dead. The Bloodspun Web could embrace their leaders. We could teach them. We could soothe the turmoil."

traits.locale_text: «Los malpianos han renunciado al concepto de las posesiones. Sus juramentos son verdaderos y similares a los nuestros, pero carentes de humildad y respeto hacia los muertos. La Red Sanguinolenta aceptaría a sus líderes. Podríamos enseñarles y apaciguar su tormento».

languages.text: 「マルピア人は『所有』という概念を放棄している。彼らの誓いは真実であり、我々と似ているものの、謙虚さと死者への畏敬の念が欠けているのだ。ブラッドスパン・ウェブは彼らの指導者を受け入れられる。彼らを導くことができる。混乱を和らげてやれる」
languages.original_text: "The Malpians have renounced the concept of possession. Their vows are true and similar to ours, but they lack humility and reverence for the dead. The Bloodspun Web could embrace their leaders. We could teach them. We could soothe the turmoil."

traits.locale_text: 「マルピア人は『所有』という概念を放棄している。彼らの誓いは真実であり、我々と似ているものの、謙虚さと死者への畏敬の念が欠けているのだ。ブラッドスパン・ウェブは彼らの指導者を受け入れられる。彼らを導くことができる。混乱を和らげてやれる」

languages.text: “马尔皮恩人已经放弃了私有财产的概念。他们的誓言是真实的，与我们的教义非常相似，但他们缺乏对死者的谦卑与敬畏。织血罗网可以接纳他们的领袖。我们可以教导他们，平息动乱。”
languages.original_text: "The Malpians have renounced the concept of possession. Their vows are true and similar to ours, but they lack humility and reverence for the dead. The Bloodspun Web could embrace their leaders. We could teach them. We could soothe the turmoil."

traits.locale_text: “马尔皮恩人已经放弃了私有财产的概念。他们的誓言是真实的，与我们的教义非常相似，但他们缺乏对死者的谦卑与敬畏。织血罗网可以接纳他们的领袖。我们可以教导他们，平息动乱。”

languages.text: "Malpililer, sahiplik kavramından vazgeçti. Yeminleri hakiki ve bizimkine benziyor ancak alçak gönüllülükten ve ölülere saygıdan yoksun. Kanipi Ağı, liderlerini bağrına basabilir. Onlara öğretebiliriz. Kargaşayı yatıştırabiliriz."
languages.original_text: "The Malpians have renounced the concept of possession. Their vows are true and similar to ours, but they lack humility and reverence for the dead. The Bloodspun Web could embrace their leaders. We could teach them. We could soothe the turmoil."
